channel.title: guide on Muhannad.0
channel.description: Recent content in guide on muhannad0.github.io

item.title: Completing the Cloud Resume Challenge
item.description: Mission Accomplished! I'd like to share how I was able to tick off all the tasks on the #CloudResumeChallenge.

item.title: Phase 5: Setting up CI/CD with Github Actions
item.description: Phase 5 of the #CloudResumeChallenge where I make use of Github Actions to run tests and deployments when an update is pushed to the code repository.

item.title: Phase 3: Building a Site Visit Counter with AWS API Gateway / Lambda / DynamoDB
item.description: Phase 3 of #CloudResumeChallenge where I develop a small application to handle a visit counter. This one was a huge learning curve for me and I share how I attempted to complete the task.

item.title: Using Docker to Setup Environments Quickly for Coding
item.description: Preparing your machine for dev work is always a time consuming thing. It sometimes gets in the way of trying to do the actual thing you set out to do. I want to share how I got started with learning a new language, framework etc without having to spend much time setting things up.

item.title: Phase 2: Host a website on AWS S3
item.description: Phase 2 of #CloudResumeChallenge where I work to host a website on AWS.

item.title: Using Github Actions to Deploy My Blog
item.description: In this post I'm going to explain how I'm deploying changes to this website using Github Actions.
